Title: Witty Twitter
Description: Witty is a free, open source Twitter client for Windows powered by the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Witty is a free, open source Twitter client for Windows powered by the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

Hi! I'm moving this over from Google Code now that CodePlex supports ClickOnce. Patches and contributors wanted!

Proposed short term roadmap
  1. Implement OAuth
  2. Set up ClickOnce using CodePlex
  3. Get MEF set up
  4. Convert Twitter library to use Hammock
  5. Look at Silverlight OOB
